EventTimeReferenceCodePaymentTermsEventT.title: Payment Terms Event Time Reference Code
EventTimeReferenceCodePaymentTermsEventT.description:
Code specifying a time that references an event that
will or has occurred.

Applicable codes:
* '5' - Date of invoice
* '24' - Date ex-works
* '29' - Date of delivery of goods to establishments/domicile/site
* '45' - Date of bill of lading, consignment note or other transport document
* '71' - Date of presentation of documents
